General Information

   You can register your Team as an administrator and create an unlimited number of team members, or obtain a Nickname and password from the Administrator and log in to the application as a user (the administrator also has all user capabilities). A user can:
1) Create new tasks for themselves, specifying the task time (with push reminders or without, up to 3 for each task).
2) Create new tasks for other Team members (also with up to 3 reminders).
3) Maintain a list of planned purchases.
Administrators and the first 2 users they register without a premium status can create up to %d new tasks daily and use up to %d reminders. For other users, the available tasks and reminders do not automatically renew daily (they need to purchase Coins or have a Premium status). Maintaining a shopping list is unlimited in quantity and does not require Coins.
If necessary, any user can buy Coins (Team Coins or TC) and exchange them for additional Tasks and Reminders.
Coins can also be used to purchase Premium Status, either for a limited period or indefinitely. In this case, the user can create up to %d new tasks and %d new reminders daily.

      Registering a New Team

   To register a new team, click the button "Reg. new Team" button.
Then choose to register via email or phone and fill out all the required information. After that, confirm your email (a message will be sent to your email address) or phone (a code will be sent via SMS). Once confirmed, you will be registered with administrator rights, enabling you to create or delete new users. After creating a new user, provide them with their Nickname and password, as well as your credentials (email or phone number) for logging into your account.

      Logging into Your Account

   To log in, click the button "Login", then enter the administratorâ€™s email or phone number (with country code but without the "+" sign) in the top field. Next, enter your Nickname and password, and click the button "Login".

   The app is intended for use in a family or other groups of people connected in daily life and having common affairs (for example, joint rent of housing or working in the same team).
   The app allows users to create or delete online tasks for execution (for themselves or other group members), as well as a shopping list.
